markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Remove Paralysis](/Spells.aspx?ID=253)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 363 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

A surge of energy frees a paralyzed creature. You can attempt to counteract a single effect imposing the paralyzed condition on the target. This does not cure someone who is paralyzed from some natural state or effect, such as paralysis caused by non-magical wounds or toxins.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The spell's range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
name: Remove Paralysis

<traits>
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 363 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">

</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
 Free a creature from paralysis.
</summary>
text: Remove Paralysis Source Core Rulebook pg. 363 4.0 Traditions Divine, Occult, Primal Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 creature --- A surge of energy frees a paralyzed creature. You can attempt to counteract a single effect imposing the paralyzed condition on the target. This does not cure someone who is paralyzed from some natural state or effect, such as paralysis caused by non-magical wounds or toxins. --- Heightened (6th) The spell's range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
